skate_surfing_description: Imagine the calm enveloping you as you ease into a pose. Feel the energy flowing through you as you focus on your breath. That's the magic of yoga, and we want you to experience it.
home_description: Imagine a serene environment where your mind and body come into a harmonious balance. Feel the energy rejuvenating you. We want you to experience it.
about_me_description: I'm Lee Gally, a certified yoga instructor with [X] years of experience. My approach focuses on [your specializations in yoga], aiming to bring peace, flexibility, and strength to my students. Whether you are a complete beginner or looking to deepen your practice, my sessions are tailored to help you succeed.
bring: Just yourself, comfortable clothing and yoga mattress if you have one.
duration: Each session lasts approximately one hour.
forBeginners: Absolutely, beginners are more than welcome!

yoga_type: Vinyasa Yoga is known for its fluid, movement-intensive practices. It involves stringing postures together so that you move from one to another, seamlessly, using breath. This can be exhilarating and help build muscle strength while improving your mental focus.
has_mat: Do You Have a Yoga Mat?

private_lesson_description: One-on-one instruction to deepen your yoga practice.
group_lesson_description: Learn in a communal setting, drawing energy and inspiration from your peers.
multi-ticket_description: Purchase 5 or 10 classes at a discounted rate. Tickets are valid for 6 months. Confirmation will be sent upon receiving a screenshot of the money transfer.
